posts.post_content:
Ubiquitously needs a Mythic Rare reprint....frankly, preferably Oversized. Not because Wizards should be saying "Hey kiddies, Zur is a fun EDH General! Go beat people up now!" But because people hate Oversized cards, and hopefully if he's Oversized, not too many people will see the need to suddenly overnight change their Commander Strategy to making people cry.  
  
But as with many Broken To Hell From the Vault cards, his power level, his notoriety, and his mystique do qualify him to be honored with the other cards like, say, [Tinker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tinker) or [Balance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Balance) that deserve a brief shoutout as a special unique-process-foil for going above and beyond the call of douchebaggery, to being QAA. (Quite Annoying, Actually.)
posts.html:
Ubiquitously needs a Mythic Rare reprint....frankly, preferably Oversized. Not because Wizards should be saying "Hey kiddies, Zur is a fun EDH General! Go beat people up now!" But because people hate Oversized cards, and hopefully if he's Oversized, not too many people will see the need to suddenly overnight change their Commander Strategy to making people cry.

But as with many Broken To Hell From the Vault cards, his power level, his notoriety, and his mystique do qualify him to be honored with the other cards like, say, Tinker or Balance that deserve a brief shoutout as a special unique-process-foil for going above and beyond the call of douchebaggery, to being QAA. (Quite Annoying, Actually.)

posts.post_content:
This guy is a monster general, Here is a way to rig an EDH game.  
  
Stack the deck with ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) or ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol) CC counterspells  
[Stave Off](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stave Off), [Rebuff the Wicked](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rebuff the Wicked), [Emerge Unscathed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emerge Unscathed), [Blessed Breath](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blessed Breath), [Turn Aside](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Turn Aside), [Apostle's Blessing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Apostle's Blessing), [Faith's Shield](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faith's Shield), [Dispel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dispel), [Cloudshift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cloudshift), & [Brave the Elements](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brave the Elements)... [Bathe in Light](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bathe in Light), [Negate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Negate), [Mana Leak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mana Leak), [Remand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Remand), [Delay](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Delay), [Arcane Denial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcane Denial), [Confound](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Confound), [Dawn Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dawn Charm), [Razor Barrier](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Razor Barrier), & [Shelter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shelter), would each get the job done.  
  
  
Also stack the deck with ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol) or ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol) mana fix//ramping artifacts.  
[Vessel of Endless Rest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vessel of Endless Rest), [Seashell Cameo](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seashell Cameo), [Drake-Sku](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drake-Sku)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
This guy is a monster general, Here is a way to rig an EDH game.

Stack the deck with or CC counterspells
Stave Off, Rebuff the Wicked, Emerge Unscathed, Blessed Breath, Turn Aside, Apostle's Blessing, Faith's Shield, Dispel, Cloudshift, & Brave the Elements... Bathe in Light, Negate, Mana Leak, Remand, Delay, Arcane Denial, Confound, Dawn Charm, Razor Barrier, & Shelter, would each get the job done.


Also stack the deck with or mana fix//ramping artifacts.
Vessel of Endless Rest, Seashell Cameo, Drake-Sku... (see all)

posts.post_content: Yes he can bring in Auras and hit an opponents Shrouded or Hexproof creature, as Zur's ability does not Target the creature, [Diplomatic Immunity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diplomatic Immunity) does not prevent you from further buffing Zur. one of the only decks that should be able to give you any problems is the Scion of the Ur-Dragon. only if its well built, seeing as you should be ramping this with artifacts and such you should be able to get Zur on the field and be able to swing once before they can cast Scion, choosing nevermore and naming Scion will net you the game.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: A very mean card to play against in EDH, need card draw? Pull [Standstill](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Standstill) or [Phyrexian Arena](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Arena) need him to survive combat? Try [Steel of Godhead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Steel of Godhead). Need generic, dear god that has to be removed immediately removal? Try [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring)...so many possibilities and a real tough general to play against. Add on top of that that his colours are {W}{U}B} and the fact that he has toughness 4 (which puts him outside of normal bolt range, not really that important in EDH but can still be a factor) and you've got yourself a mean general.
posts.html:
A very mean card to play against in EDH, need card draw? Pull Standstill or Phyrexian Arena need him to survive combat? Try Steel of Godhead. Need generic, dear god that has to be removed immediately removal? Try Oblivion Ring...so many possibilities and a real tough general to play against. Add on top of that that his colours are {W}{U}B} and the fact that he has toughness 4 (which puts him outside of normal bolt range, not really that important in EDH but can still be a factor) and you've got yourself a mean general.
